title: Sunny's Korean Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Catering, Korean, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Korean restaurant in downtown Mishawaka specializing in healthier and veg-friendly Korean food with reduced or no oil. Food is made in-house using seasonal ingredients. Many items can be made vegan upon request. No MSG used. Friday and Saturday evening is all-you-can-eat buffet. Also offers cooking lessons. Operating since 1992 and previously known as Sunny's Kim Chee Garden Patio.
